name: The Art of Code Debugging
description: Exploring the intricate art of bugs and debugging.

lessons.description: Beetles and bugs, debugging through the ages.

lessons.description: A review of famous software bugs and real life bugs- and the lessons learned.

name: Coffee and Code
description: The essential relationship between coffee consumption and coding performance.

lessons.description: An exploration of coffee types best suited for long coding sessions (Americano is best) .

lessons.name: The Coffee-Code Cycle
lessons.description: Understanding the cyclic dependency between coding and coffee.

lessons.name: Espresso vs. Filter Coffee: The Impact on Bug Fixing
lessons.description: A study on how different types of coffee affect debugging skills.

name: Quantum Computing for Cats
description: An introductory course on quantum computing, simplified for human comprehension.

lessons.name: Schrodinger's Bit
lessons.description: Understanding the quantum bit through Schrodinger's cat.

lessons.name: Using Quantum Computers to Open Cat Kibble
lessons.description: A practical application of quantum computing in a cat's daily life.

name: The Philosophy of Artificial Intelligence
description: Contemplating the existential implications of AI and its future.

name: Hacking the Kitchen
description: Applying computer science principles to revolutionize mac-and-cheese.

name: The Secret Life of Algorithms
description: A look at how algorithms influence our world.

name: Virtual Reality in Everyday Life
description: Exploring how virtual reality is merging with daily activities (Apple Vision Pro) .

name: The Gamification of Everything
description: Understanding the process  of applying game design elements.
